ข้อมูลบริการซ่อม.query: SELECT repairing_job_id, repairing_status, repairing_receive, customer_name, customer_tel, repairing_product, brand_name AS repairing_brand, repairing_model, repairing_failure FROM info_repairing i JOIN customers c ON i.repairing_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.repairing_brand = b.brand_id

ข้อมูลการคืนสินค้า.query: SELECT returning_id, returning_product, brand_name AS returning_brand, returning_model, returning_failure, returning_compensate_method FROM info_returning i JOIN brands b ON i.returning_brand = b.brand_id

ข้อมูลการจัดส่งสินค้า.query: SELECT delivery_job_id, delivery_purchase, delivery_appoint, staff_name AS delivery_staff, customer_name, customer_tel, delivery_qty, delivery_product, brand_name AS delivery_brand, delivery_product_model FROM info_delivery i JOIN staff s ON i.delivery_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.delivery_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.delivery_brand = b.brand_id

จานดาวเทียม.query: SELECT installsat_id, installsat_purchase, installsat_appoint, staff_name AS installsat_staff, customer_name, customer_tel, installsat_product, brand_name AS installsat_brand, installsat_qty_receiver FROM info_installation_sat i JOIN staff s ON i.installsat_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.installsat_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.installsat_brand = b.brand_id

แอร์.query: SELECT installac_id, installac_purchase, installac_appoint, staff_name AS installac_staff, customer_name, customer_tel, installac_product, brand_name AS installac_brand, installac_model_in FROM info_installation_ac i JOIN staff s ON i.installac_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.installac_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.installac_brand = b.brand_id

เครื่องทำน้ำอุ่น.query: SELECT installwh_id, installwh_purchase, installwh_appoint, staff_name AS installwh_staff, customer_name, customer_tel, installwh_product, brand_name AS installwh_brand, installwh_model FROM info_installation_wh i JOIN staff s ON i.installwh_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.installwh_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.installwh_brand = b.brand_id

รายชื่อศูนย์บริการ.query: SELECT sv_partner_id, sv_partner_type, sv_partner_name, sv_partner_tel, brand_name AS sv_partner_brand FROM service_partners s JOIN brands b ON sv_partner_brand = b.brand_id
